gameDetails.name: Xenon Profiteer: Tactics & Profiteers Expansion Pack
gameDetails.description:
Xenon Profiteer: Sci-Fi Contracts, Profiteers, and Business Tactics were initially available as stretch goals for the Xenon Profiteer Kickstarter campaign.

The Sci-Fi Contracts propose three contracts with a science fiction flair to them. The Profiteers are five player roles that introduce individual player powers in the game, and the Business Tactics are five "superpowers" independent from the Profiteers that provide individual abilities for greater variability and replay value.
